nodes.text: Orgadomo Dokura was a pink-skinned male Twi'lek who aided Sinjir Rath Velus in evading Imperial forces and escaping Akiva. Dokura asked Velus to make him an agent of the New Republic in the months following the Battle of Endor. However he was shot and killed by Surat Nuat's gang. Upon hearing about Dokura's death, Sinjir felt a bit of remorse over not taking him seriously.
